synopsis.text:
Capital Police Department's elite Special Service of Crime (SSC) unit member, James Blood, finds himself entangled in a perplexing crime saga when he encounters a mysterious mask that seemingly defies existence. Meanwhile, Sarah Sinclair, a crown prosecutor's subordinate, witnesses her superior, Monica Campbell, inexplicably collapse while investigating the enigmatic LIVE enterprise.

As the police station is assaulted by an individual James believed to be deceased, the duo unites to unravel the masterminds behind these events. Their investigation leads them to a sinister conspiracy revolving around LIVE, masks that grant superhuman abilities, and supposedly deceased prisoners who somehow escaped years ago. Amidst the unfolding chaos, James and Sarah strive to unveil the truth behind these uncanny bio-masks and the sudden string of mysterious deaths in this action-packed thriller set in a captivating cityscape.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
